snippet.title: Ballistic Baseball out now on Apple Arcade | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
⚾ PLAY BALL! ⚾

The crack of a big hit, an outfielder jumping for a catch, a runners sliding into home plate… these are the moments that make baseball so thrilling!  

Get ready for baseball action that is authentic and refreshingly different.

Available now on Apple Arcade. https://apple.co/-Ballistic #AppleArcade
